me.Treidex.Game

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Treidex.Game.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Imagine the world if everyone just did whatever, with no organization. Crazy, right? That is why Managers exist. This is the Manager for your game.
    Author:
    Treidex
